title: Physician clinical decision modification and bias assessment in a randomized controlled trial of AI assistance
details: E Goh, B Bunning, EC Khoong, RJ Gallo, A Milstein… - Communications Medicine, 2025
abstract: Background Artificial intelligence assistance in clinical decision making shows promise, but concerns exist about potential exacerbation of demographic biases in healthcare. This study aims to evaluate how physician clinical decisions and biases …
